page.title: 02IMPROVING THE DEARNE AREA
page.content: In my opinion to improve our Area is to have more facilities for the younger generation, things like {swimming pools and amusements.} I think that our Area should cater for the disabled in buildings like the library in Goldthorpe. They have steps to get to the next floors, I think they should have lifts or ramps but the problem is lack of money. In Goldthorpe and Highgate there is a lack of{public toilets.} There are only two public toilets in our Area and these two are too dirty to use; but there again it needs money to build new ones. In Goldthorpe and Highgate we don't have many{childrens clothes shops. }If you want clothes for children you have to go to Doncaster or Mexborough to the bigger clothes stores.
